text: The Two Boys (French: Les deux gosses) is a 1924 French silent film directed by Louis Mercanton and starring Jean Mercanton, André Rolane and Leslie Shaw.Holmstrom p.44 It was based on the 1880 novel of the same name by Pierre Decourcelle. It was remade as a sound film in 1934. ==Cast== * Jean Mercanton as Fanfan, jeune * André Rolane as Claudinet, jeune * Leslie Shaw as Fanfan * Jean Forest as Claudinet * Yvette Guilbert as Zéphyrine * Gabriel Signoret as La limace * Albert Decoeur as Mulot * Marjorie Hume as Hélène de Kerlor * Carlyle Blackwell as Comte Georges de Kerlor * Gina Relly as Carmen de Saint- Hyriex * Édouard Mathé as D'Alboise * Paul Guidé as Saint-Hyriex * Jeanne Rollette as Ernestine * Irma Perrot as Thérèse * Louis Kerly as Le maître d'hôtel * Andrews Engelmann as Fadart * Paul Franceschi ==References== ==Bibliography== * John Holmstrom.
